sentences.sContent: The lack of such leaders may also be the hallmark of a largely post-ideological era in which far less need is felt for unifying doctrines or the grandiose figures who provide them.
sentences.sContent_eng: The lack of such leaders may also be the hallmark of a largely post-ideological era in which far less need is felt for unifying doctrines or the grandiose figures who provide them.
sentences.sCn: 这种领袖人物的缺乏可能也是一个大后意识形态时代的重要象征，在这个时代，人们更少需要一个统一的教义或是一个提供给大众的浮夸形象。

synos.tran: 宏伟的；堂皇的；浮夸的；宏大的

trans.tranCn: 宏伟的；堂皇的；浮夸的；宏大的
trans.tranOther: grandiose plans sound very important or impressive, but are not practical
